instructions:
Mix 1 tsp Lipton's Onion Soup Mix with 1/4 cup water and 2 cans mushroom soup; set aside. Combine
and mix well all remaining ingredients. Form into 6 oblong rolls and place in a greased 2 quart casserole.
Pour the mushroom soup mixture over the meat rolls. Bake uncovered in a 350-degree oven for 1 to 1 1/4
hours. Turn meat rolls at least once. Serve with buttered noodles. 
*(Rev. 3/15/94)*
name: Beef Rolls
creator: Mary Decker
